metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0630

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP4 for x86

metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 10.3.183.50 and 11.x before 11.5.502.146 on Windows and Mac OS X, before 10.3.183.50 and 11.x before 11.2.202.261 on Linux, before 11.1.111.31 on Android 2.x and 3.x, and before 11.1.115.36 on Android 4.x; Adobe AIR before 3.5.0.1060; and Adobe AIR SDK before 3.5.0.1060 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
